Generation I.Red: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.
Generation I.Green: (This entry was originally untranslated in English until it was reused in Pokémon FireRed .)
Generation I.Blue: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.
Generation I.Yellow: Will chew on anything with its fangs. If you see one, it is certain that 40 more live in the area.
Generation I.Stadium: Scurries around quickly, searching for hard objects to gnaw. It appears to be jittery and unable to remain still.

Generation II.Gold: It eats anything. Wherever food is available, it will settle down and produce offspring continuously.
Generation II.Silver: Living wherever there is food available, it ceaselessly scavenges for edibles the entire day.
Generation II.Crystal: This Pok é mon 's impressive vitality allows it to live anywhere. It also multiplies very quickly.
Generation II.Stadium 2: It eats anything. Wherever food is available, it will settle down and produce offspring continuously. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) Living wherever there is food available, it ceaselessly scavenges for edibles the entire day. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Rattata is cautious in the extreme. Even while it is asleep, it constantly listens by moving its ears around. It is not picky about where it lives - it will make its nest anywhere.
Generation III.Sapphire: Rattata is cautious in the extreme. Even while it is asleep, it constantly listens by moving its ears around. It is not picky about where it lives - it will make its nest anywhere.
Generation III.Emerald: A Rattata is cautious in the extreme. Even while it is asleep, it constantly moves its ears and listens for danger. It will make its nest anywhere.
Generation III.FireRed: Its fangs are long and very sharp. They grow continuously, so it gnaws on hard things to whittle them down.
Generation III.LeafGreen: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.

Generation IV.Diamond: Cautious in the extreme, its hardy vitality lets it live in any kind of environment.
Generation IV.Pearl: Cautious in the extreme, its hardy vitality lets it live in any kind of environment.
Generation IV.Platinum: Cautious in the extreme, its hardy vitality lets it live in any kind of environment.
Generation IV.HeartGold: It eats anything. Wherever food is available, it will settle down and produce offspring continuously.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: Living wherever there is food available, it ceaselessly scavenges for edibles the entire day.

Generation V.Black: Cautious in the extreme, its hardy vitality lets it live in any kind of environment.
Generation V.White: Cautious in the extreme, its hardy vitality lets it live in any kind of environment.
Generation V.Black 2: It searches for food all day. It gnaws on hard objects to wear down its fangs, which grow constantly during its lifetime.
Generation V.White 2: It searches for food all day. It gnaws on hard objects to wear down its fangs, which grow constantly during its lifetime.

Generation VI.X: Living wherever there is food available, it ceaselessly scavenges for edibles the entire day.
Generation VI.Y: Its fangs are long and very sharp. They grow continuously, so it gnaws on hard things to whittle them down.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Rattata is cautious in the extreme. Even while it is asleep, it constantly listens by moving its ears around. It is not picky about where it lives—it will make its nest anywhere.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Rattata is cautious in the extreme. Even while it is asleep, it constantly listens by moving its ears around. It is not picky about where it lives—it will make its nest anywhere.

Generation VII.Sun: With its incisors, it gnaws through doors and infiltrates people's homes. Then, with a twitch of its whiskers, it steals whatever food it finds.
Generation VII.Moon: When the sun goes down, it becomes active. It runs around town on a chase for good food for the boss of its nest—Raticate.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It shows no interest in anything that isn't fresh. If you take it shopping with you, it will help you pick out ingredients.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Night after night, they sneak into people's homes seeking food. A massive outbreak of them has become an issue of public concern.
Generation VII.Let's Go Pikachu: Its whiskers provide it with a keen sense of smell, enabling it to pick up the scent of hidden food and locate it instantly.
Generation VII.Let's Go Eevee: Its whiskers provide it with a keen sense of smell, enabling it to pick up the scent of hidden food and locate it instantly.

Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It's cautious in the extreme, and its hardy vitality lets it live in any kind of environment.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It's cautious in the extreme, and its hardy vitality lets it live in any kind of environment.
